title: Minimalism: A Documentary About the Important Things

sources.title: WE HEARD THE BELLS: The Influenza of 1918 (DOCUMENTARY)
sources.description:
A FIlm by Lisa Laden for the  US Department of Health and Human Services.
Narrated by S. Epatha Merkerson, featuring Dr. Anthony Fauci.
1918 saw World War I come to an end, where millions had died in the European Trenches. However, a new horror was brewing, a terrifying virus that would eventually claim 50 million lives.

Meet the survivors who describe what it was like to live through the 1918 flu pandemic. Why did it kill so many people? Why were so many of the dead young adults? Where did this lethal flu come from? And most important, how can we keep a pandemic like this from occurring again?

sources.title: Laurel & Hardy: Seeing Double (Documentary)
sources.description:
Stan Laurel & Oliver Hardy were one of the greatest comedy duos of all-time and still delight audiences with their skilful, slapstick antics - but who were the men behind the comedy masks? How did a thin Englishman come to be paired with an amply proportioned funny man from America's deep south? Take a journey and find all the answers and more... including a visit to the Laurel & Hardy Museum.

Directed & Produced by Liam Dale
Written & Narrated by Barnaby Eaton-Jones


00:00 Full documentary
02:59 Exploration of the lives of iconic comedy duo Laurel and Hardy, from their humble beginnings to worldwide fame.
08:08 Exploration of early life and career defining events of Stan Laurel and Oliver Hardy.
15:40 Struggles and aspirations of Stan Laurel and Oliver Hardy in the early days of their careers.
22:07 The journey of Stan Laurel and Oliver Hardy from individual acts to a successful comedy duo.
29:26 Exploration of Laurel and Hardy's personal lives, struggles, and success in the film industry.
36:17 The tumultuous personal lives of Laurel and Hardy intertwined with their successful film career.
43:31 Exploration of Laurel and Hardy's personal lives, film career, and decline in 20th Century Fox.
51:02 Exploration of the lives and careers of Laurel and Hardy, iconic comedy duo, culminating in their individual legacies.
57:26 Exploration of the timeless comedic duo Laurel & Hardy, highlighting their childlike charm and enduring legacy.


@CultCinemaClassics
Members-only videos https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

metadata.Plot: How might your life be better with less? Minimalism: A Documentary About the Important Things examines the many flavors of minimalism by taking the audience inside the lives of minimalists from all walks of life -- families, entrepreneurs, architects, artists, journalists, scientists, and even a former Wall Street broker -- all of whom are striving to live a meaningful life with less.
metadata.Actors: Dan Harris, Ryan Nicodemus, Rick Hanson
